title: The Melody: A Mazy Garza Mystery
description: When private investigator Mazy Garza chances upon the scene of an unusual suicide, she is drawn into the dark realm of medieval magic wielded by a teenage violin prodigy. From the corporate towers of Los Angeles to the gloomy rooms of the Thiessen House in Sierra Madre, Mazy follows a trail of adultery, betrayal, and murder, leading to a troubled girl with the power to reshape reality. The first book in the Mazy Garza Mystery series, The Melody offers a paranormal twist on classic California noir.
author: Sara Jay Casares
